summary: This document is an email communication from Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank to Lesley regarding a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein. The meeting is intended to involve Paul and the Deutsche Bank team managing Epstein's accounts during the week of October 8 when he returns to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to coordinate a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team that will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is the recipient of the email and is being asked to check availability for the meeting.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for her client, Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeffrey Epstein is requesting a meeting with Paul, who is part of the team managing his accounts.
Amanda is reaching out to Lesley to check on the availability for the meeting.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team during the week of October 8.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, US 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is seeking to set up a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is planned for the week of October 8 when Epstein returns to New York City.
Harry communicated Epstein's request to Amanda Kirby.
Lesley is being asked to check on the availability for the meeting.
